job.title: Data Scientist.
job.description: Janssen Pharmaceuticals Inc a member of Johnson amp Johnsons Family of Companies is recruiting for a Data Scientist in Janssen Business Technology located in Titusville NJ Raritan NJ or Horsham PAbrbrAt the Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson amp Johnson what matters most is helping people live full and healthy lives We focus on treating curing and preventing some of the most devastating and complex diseases of our time And we pursue the most promising science wherever it might be foundbrbrThe Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson amp Johnson provide medicines for an array of health concerns in several therapeutic areas Our ultimate goal is to help people live healthy lives We have produced and marketed many firstinclass prescription medications and are poised to serve the broad needs of the healthcare market  from patients to practitioners from clinics to hospitals For more about the Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson amp Johnson visit httpwwwjanssenpharmaceuticalsinccombrbrWe are Janssen Our mission drives us Our patients inspire us We collaborate with the world for the health of everyone in itbrbrThe Commercial Data Sciences amp Data Management team within Janssen Pharmaceuticals Business Technology organization is looking for an extraordinary scientist who is passionate about crafting developing and fielding data science solutions that drive impact for patients and for Janssen There are many ways to explore and analyze data and this powers the excitement and passion of data scientists at Janssen as many business units are eager to use the data to build business valuebrbrIn this role you will be someone who stays on the cutting edge of artificial intelligence data science and advanced analytics research through novel project execution and development of algorithms that influence decisions at various levels in the organization including but not limited to omnichannel sales and marketing optimization patientpayer analytics and related commerciallyfocused model development The role requires both a broad knowledge of existing AItype algorithms and the creativity to invent and customize when necessary You will partner with matrixed teams to deliver projects and develop solutions that in turn deliver insights You will be part of a dynamic accomplished organization that will support multiple therapeutic areas and commercial functionsbrbrstrongQualificationsbrstrongul liPhD with 02 years of experience or MS with 3 years of relevant pharma sales amp marketing experience in Computer Sciences Statistics Machine Learning amp Artificial Intelligence Physics Molecular Biology Bioinformatics Computational Informatics Medical Informatics Computational Biology or a related disciplineli liStrong working knowledge of machine learning platformsenvironmentsli liStrong working knowledge of AItype algorithms including machine learning techniques such as regression decision trees probability networks association rules clustering neural networks andor Bayesian modelsli liFamiliarity with large datasets handling of healthcare relevant datasets and understanding of data analysis workflowsli liProficient with one or more programming language such as Python R SAS or Javali liExperience delivering on data science projects using predictive technologies data mining andor text miningli liFamiliarity with working in a cloudbased technology stackli liStrong communication skillsli liThis position can be based in one of our following locations Titusville NJ Raritan NJ or Horsham PAli ul strongPreferred Qualificationsbrstrongul liExperience in the commercial pharmaceuticals businessli liExperience with sales and marketing best practices processes and related technologyli liWorking knowledge of commercially available healthcare data setsli liExperience with Pyspark is a plusli liProficiency with SQL is a plusli brbrulJohnson amp Johnson is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity age national
